PAD_ScienceComment.synopsis: If Lae'zel or GITH avatar is present they react to interacting with the science instruments in the Infirmary. If they aren't present, some other party character reacts with generic comment.
PAD_ScienceComment.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Ago to1284; -2; -817interact with a science instrument
